title: Scraping JSON, HTML, and ZIP Files with Pure SQLite
excerpt: a.k.a. leave BeautifulSoup in the past and embrace SQL I used DALL·E to generate thumbnails for this post: “cute cartoon|claymation abominable snowman scraping ice off his frozen car windshield” is nightmare fuel Some of the most common web-scraping tasks can be done in pure SQLite - meaning no Python, Node, Ruby, or other programming languages necessary, only the SQLite CLI and some extensions.
